subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Pete Newell is 91 and has acknowledged that his memory is no longer what it used to be. Still, Newell, a Hall of Fame coach, can be caught diagramming plays with his fingers on the tabletop and weighing in on all the differences in today’s game.
